titles.title: A bill to extend the provisions of the Protect America Act of 2007 for an additional 30 days.

action.text: Introduced in the Senate. Read the first time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Read the First Time.

calendar.text: Read the second time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 564.

bill.summary:
1/24/2008--Introduced.
Amends the Protect America Act of 2007 (currently set to expire on February 1, 2008) to extend its authority for 30 days.
